moves.1. f4: Bird's Opening. Not very common at all.
moves.2. Nf3: Fairly strong centre for white, especially on e4.
moves.3. e4: Blunder. I get a knight and a pawn.
moves.4. Bb5+: Another mistake. Gives me a free move.
moves.8. Rh4: Why is he developing rook so early?
moves.8... e5: Discovered attack under the guise of centre control.
moves.9... Qxh4+: Check. Pretty much half of white's army is gone.
moves.12... Nb3+: Discovered attack gains me a rook.
moves.13... Nxa1#: Checkmate! This was one of my quickest winning games ever. Feel free to comment and suggest how I could improve.
